title: The Last Vampire: Evil Thirst / Creatures of Forever
description: Beautiful Alisa Perne looks and acts like a regular teenager, but she has lived for over 5,000 years, surviving near death and evil on an epic scale. Alisa has done this because she is tough and brave, and she is the Last Vampire ....Alisa is battling with a heartbreaking dilemma. Her daughter, Kalika, has disappeared. Alisa knows the great danger Kalika poses to the human world - but can she bring herself to destroy her own flesh and blood? And another threat looms large to Alisa. Someone means to destroy the 5000-year-old vampire, and Alisa's only hope lies in reliving the evil of her monstrous past. Then she can eliminate it. For ever.
author: Christopher Pike
